flavorText: Dominarians gladly fought alongside kavu . . . until the kavu figured out some Dominarians were quite tasty.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Völker Dominarias kämpften bereitwillig Seite an Seite mit den Kavus... bis die Kavus feststellten, daß Dominarier auch recht lecker schmecken.
foreignData.name: Jagender Kavu
foreignData.text: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Entferne den Jagenden Kavu und eine nichtfliegende Kreatur Deiner Wahl, die Dich angreift, ganz aus dem Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: Les Dominarians se battaient volontiers aux côtés des kavrus... jusqu'à ce que certains kavrus trouvent certains Dominarians appétissants.
foreignData.name: Kavru chasseur
foreignData.text: {1}{R}{G}{T} : Retirez de la partie le Kavru chasseur et la créature sans le vol ciblée qui vous attaque.

name: Hunting Kavu
originalText:
o1o
Ro
G, oc
T: Remove from the game Hunting Kavu and target creature without flying that's attacking you.

rulings.text: Being “without flying” is a targeting restriction. The ability won’t resolve if the target gains flying before the ability resolves.

text: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Exile Hunting Kavu and target creature without flying that's attacking you.
